title: RIOT DUDES PLEASE RESPOND IM TIRED OF THIS
body: THIS IS THE 3RD TIME YOU HAVE RELEASE A UPDATE AS I AM ABOUT TO GO INTO QUE AND IT LOGS ME OUT AND I CANT RECCONECT AND I HAVE TO FUCKING LOSE AND GET 5 20 MIN QUES I JUST GOT DONE WITH THEM AND FIRST GAME I LOAD IN GAME AND I DC 1 MINUTE IN AND I CANT RECCONECT UNTIL THIS GAME IS DONE PLEASE FIX THIS AND TAKE MY PENALTY OFF NOW!!!!!!!!!!

replies.body:
It's definitely frustrating when you cannot connect to a match due to a technical issue. Unfortunately, regardless of the reason the disconnection happens, it still negatively impacts everyone in the match. This is a key reason why all disconnections are treated equally, and why penalties cannot be modified or removed. 

I recommend working towards solving the core issue causing your disconnections before queueing for more games and potentially gaining more penalties. If you can give me a bit more details about the behavior you experience before the disconnection happens, along with any error messages you see, I can point you in the right direction.

Let me know if you have any questions.
I love the contrast between the style of speech of this response and OP's post.
